name: The Broken Knight
description:
Info

The Broken Knight is a gameboy-style game about an undead knight on a quest to right the wrongs of his past. The game is pretty short (around an hour), but I plan on continuing the story in the future.

*Note*

As of now the game does not have sound or music. 

Controls
  • Use Arrow Keys or WASD to move around.
  • To interact with things Press Alt on PC or Press A on mobile.
  • If you're using the ROM with an emulator Press Enter to save your progress
Credits

This game was made possible in part by Pixel Pete's Art Assets. 

The art for the game was made using Pixaki and the game itself was made in GB Studio.

That's it go play the game!
